>
[Pick up the Pace](/Feats.aspx?ID=2140) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 208 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Constitution 14

</column>

---

You lead by example and can help others push themselves beyond their normal limits. When [Hustling](/Actions.aspx?ID=515) in a group during exploration mode, your group can Hustle for up to 20 additional minutes, to a maximum of the amount of time the character with the highest Constitution modifier could Hustle alone.

<title level="2">Pick up the Pace leads to...</title>
[Caravan Leader](/Feats.aspx?ID=2115)
